shortDescription: ipeak Infosystems ibexwebCMS (aka IPeakCMS) 3.5 is vulnerable to an unauthenticated Boolean-based SQL injection via the id parameter on the /cms/print.php page.
vulnerabilityName: ipeak ipeakcms Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
